item.title: Another Sync to Rootstalk Production (DigitalOcean) with Dev
item.description: My goal for this afternoon, November 7, 2022, was to find repeat a process last performed almost a year ago on December 22, 2021, to synchronize changes in the development copy of Rootstalk (the main branch https://github.com/Digital-Grinnell/rootstalk) with our production deployment (the main branch of https://github.com/Digital-Grinnell/rootstalk-DO) to DigitalOcean. This should be a simple repeat of the process documented in Sync Rootstalk Production (DigitalOcean) with Dev. As before, I used guidance found in How To Merge Between Two Local Repositories to accomplish this.

item.title: Sync Rootstalk Production (DigitalOcean) with Dev

I used guidance found in How To Merge Between Two Local Repositories to accomplish this with mixed results. Note: Our staging site cast from the main branch of https://github.com/Digital-Grinnell/rootstalk, an Azure static app, can be accessed via https://icy-tree-020380010.azurestaticapps.net.
